casebody.data:
HILARIO'S TRUCK CENTER, LLC
v.
Laura RINALDI et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 10, 2018

Kenneth A. Votre, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn. App. 597, 193 A.3d 683 (2018), is denied.
